participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Nostalgic and family-oriented with a flair for enjoying the simple pleasures in life.
participant_1.background: I sometimes get a little too nostalgic when I think about my childhood. I don't play sports because I'm too busy going to brunch with my family. after finishing my career i discovered that i am not that passionate about it. i think i m fabulous. i have horrible allergies.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Creative and industrious, with a passion for crafting and a love for cozy moments.
participant_2.background: I wouldn't be able to be a Christmas tree decorator if I were blind. I don't like fast food, but I love a good cup of chai tea. I knit myself a sweater that is so warm and comfy, and it also helps me fight my sweet tooth because I'm too busy knitting to eat gummy worms! i worked 3 jobs at the same time for more than 5 years. i am an award winning th member.

content.text: Hey! How is your day going?
good, just got done with my coffee.  what about you?
just finished knitting a sweater for myself. i like to keep busy.
that is so cool! i am not very good at knitting.  i am more of a brunch person, haha.
i like brunch too! do you have any favorite brunch spots?
i love going to sunnyside, they have a great breakfast burrito.  what about you?
i love going there too! but i really like going to the place next door, they have better mimosas.
i will have to check that place out!
you should! i also love their chai tea, it is so good.
chai tea is one of my favorite things!
we should go to brunch together sometime!
great! i will send you a message.
